author: nflaig
content: https://simpleserialize.com/ has been updated and supports full uint64 range now

author: sauliusgrigaitis
content: the Seems that some Beacon Node API consumers ignore `execution_optimistic` param in the event stream. This makes some wrong situations when a consumer falsely believes that the new safe block is available after it sees the event with ignored `execution_optimistic=true` param. What is the general consensus to solve it? Do not send `execution_optimistic=true` events? Inform consumer to respect `execution_optimistic` param?
